Reviews.Title: Good Purchase
Reviews.Author: Lcrane
Reviews.Content: I searched for this cable for a couple of and to my surprise Amazon had it in stock. Im so relieved!

Reviews.Title: Zmodo W-VP1030 AWG24 Video + Power CCTV Cable (30 Meters, 100 Feet)
Reviews.Author: Daniel Bender "Daniel Bender"
Reviews.Content: Excellent CCTV cables! Very heavy gauge. No problems running them the full 100' and the signal was very strong. I would recommend this if you need long runs for your CCTV system.

Reviews.Title: Wire
Reviews.Author: Jim Weadon
Reviews.Content: click and play with the zmodo system and gets you the extra length needed for the last camera on the other side

Reviews.Title: Don't know yet -- updated
Reviews.Author: Robin Stevenson
Reviews.Content: Delivery was quick.  I strung it last weekend but that was a bigger job than I anticipated so I'm not going to have an opportunity to finish the set-up until this weekend.  UPDATE:  Everything worked well.

Reviews.Title: 100 ft to replace a cable that was short
Reviews.Author: Terry Hill
Reviews.Content: It worked just like it was supposed to.  It replaced a cable that came with the camera that was 2 ft shorter than advertised.

Reviews.Title: none in stock
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: Basically false advertisement. did not have the item but said was in stock.Extremely disappointed and they were suppose to send complimentary gift but, that never happened so...
